{{Infobox_Broadcast | call_letters = DYAQ-TV| station_logo = | station_slogan = | station_branding = ''SMNI TV-30 Iloilo''| analog = 30 ([[UHF]])| digital = | founded = | location = [[Iloilo City]]| owner = [[ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network|Sonshine Media Network International]]| callsign_meaning = '''D Y A'''pollo
'''Q'''uiboloy| affiliations = [[ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network|Sonshine Media Network International]]| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 3 kilowatts| homepage = [http://www.sonshinetv.com/ ACQ-KBN Sonshine TV]| }} '''SMNI TV-30 Iloilo''', DYAQ-TV channel 30, is a relay station of SMNI TV-43 Davao. It is currently operated from Davao City by the Sonshine Media Network International (SMNI) after the network and expand to entire Philippines. In Iloilo, Transmitter is located beside at Iloilo Business Hotel, Diversion Road, Iloilo City. ==See also== *[[ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network]] {{Iloilo City TV}} [[Category:Television in Iloilo City]] [[Category:ACQ-Kingdom Broadcasting Network]] [[ceb:DYAQ-TV]]
